text: edata balaganna puluwan aanduwen ki denek eliyata enawa da kiyala.
mage thathwe therum ganna bari" pawanige handa hama welema mage oluwa athule donkara denawa.
mathale pradeshiya sabhawa
api me wasangathayen inne aarambhaye da mada awasanaye da kiyala nishchithawa kiyanna widiyak na
aya ga්rami sammana ulela sandaha sahabhagi wu awasthawe di age surupi swarupaya dutu boho denek pawasa thibune mosthara nirupanayata pamanak nowa aya ranganayata da wadath sudusu bawaya.
ada enam pebarawari 12 wanidath sawasa 6.30ta irana sinamapatayak thiragatha wimata niyamithayi.

mulya hingaya pawum miliyana 90 k tharam adhika agayak gani.4.

lenin atham karunu athin nirmanashili unath aththa washayenma panthiya wenuwata pakshaya gena eema eka paththakin ee wagema bahuthara janamathaya wenuwata pakshaya idiripath kirima wenuwen, ee wagema swabhawika welandapala ki්rayakarithwaya wenuwata salasumkarana ki්rayakarithwaya idiripath kirima aadi karanawalin nirmanashiliyek unata, ohuta lokaye wisheshayenma rusiyanu janathawage nirmanashilithwaya mota kirime purogamiya hatiyatath multhana labenawa.
ookun kohomath prathipaththiyak nathi awasthawadi gorakayo..
onna porak thadi troliyak thallu karan aawa.
aanduwa rajya saha pudgalika bankuwalin rupiyal koti 5500 ka athi wishala naya mudalak laba gath athara paudgalika anshayata bankuwalin naya lesa laba dunne rupiyal koti 500 k pamanayi.
nathnam dewa duthayek da?

mita amatharawa awasan sathiye polis kridanganaye pawathi tharagayedi polis pila lakunu 43-36k lesa parajaya karannata yuda hamudawa samath wu athara tharagawalin anushurathawa dinagath nawika hamudawa rathmalanedi lakunu 50-28k lesa guwan hamudawa parajaya karanu labiya.

sathyaya, paramathwaya, yatharthaya, maranayen pasu sidu wanne kumakda, apa pamina thibenne kohe sitada aadi prashna sambandhayen apage unanduwa yanu waraprasaditha sulutharayakage pudgalika unanduwak nowe.
me post godak eyala kiyawanawa...
swarnamaya yugayak pahu kalada, idiriyata labenawada kiyala kiyanna baha.
api inwestigeshan ekak karanne.
mawa ara aluth kindiyata daganna.
ayage handa handumbaraya.
ganan kiyanne ithin ganna yana wiyadama wage bara ganak nadaththuwata yanawa.....

obe lipiye yam yam adahas samaga ekanga wenawa.
mama awidinneth harima parissamen.
ethanata yanna nam ithama prasiddha charithayak yoda gaththoth mama sithana nirmanaya bihikaranna baha kiyala hithuna.
namuth hama deyakma anithya wana sansaraye rathu hamuduruwange kotiyak sanwara shilaya nithya wimata idak nowe.
panala gedara aawa.
habayi adatath rate minissu danne naha thamanta waradune kothanada kiyala.

me pidanaya awasanwi ape jiwitha yatha thaththwayata pathwimath samaga api yangjiyago kara sendu wi sajiaadiyan jayagrahanayen pasu masa hayaka pamana kalayak ehima gatha kalemu.
me tharam dina anukaraka adhyapanayak nam loke kohewath nathuwa athi.
un katha karana hama winadiyatama badu gahala..anthimata mase bilata thawath siyayata ekolahak gahanawa.
pahuwadata habayi kampas ekata yanne kage banumakata ahuweyida kiyana bayen.

anathuruwa ena athuru sanwadaya.
wahana karmanthaya[sanskaranaya] niwa motar rathaya jathyanthara sarthakathwaya laba ganimin palamu oof-rod wahanaya wiya, thawamath kanadawata, dakunu amarikawata ha yuropayata apanayanaya karayi.

upanda sita nagara sabhawa sathu idamwala waripanam badu gewamin me dakwa padinchiwa sitina me wasiyan padinchiya thahawuru kirima sandaha labadi aththe nagarasabhawa wisin dena lada depala thakseruwayi.

polisiya pawasanne shri lanka podujana peramune apekshakaya ohuge aadharakaruwa siya niwasata yathuru padiyen ragena yamin sitiyadi kodagoda tharamulla margayedi eksath jathika nidahas peramune apekshakaya saha thawath dedenek margaya haras kota ema yathuru padiya nawatha mema pahara dima sidukara athi bawa paminille sandahan wana bawayi.
hondayi mama eekatath kramayak kiyala dennam.
hindi chithrapatiwala karunawantha aachchita wagema napuru aachchitath eka widihata pana powapu me sundara thanaththiya ranganaya thamange pradhana wruththiya karaganne naha.
me lipiyen mukha sansargaya pilibanda oba poduwe danagatha yuthu karunu monawadayi yanna pahadili kirimak kerenu athi.

wishala pradeshayak pura wisirunu pala rashiyak aaraksha kirima apahasu karunak bawin kelinma bija keshthraye situwima nirdesha nokarana athara dina 25-30 k pamana wayasa athi nirogi pala kshethraye situwiya yuthu we.
"ow madhu mata udawuwak karanna.
aththama kiwwoth man oya chayarupa shilpaye kela pamini manawakayek wenta kaliyen thama ee pilibada prawina wicharakayek bawata path une..
"hari eeka paththakin thiyamuko..unnahe kohomada mechchara udenma methanata enne?
thota wayasa kiyada?
sinamawa karmanthayak widiyata pawathwa gena yanna monawada karanna oone ?
aya siti thana pihita thibune bombaya pathitha wu thana sita mitar 700k, 800k durin.

marana danduwama kriyathmaka kirimata pera eki mitsuyi prakasha kara thibune eki siduwim sambandhawa thama mahath se la-jawata saha kampawata pathwana bawayi. 1951 sapthambar masa pawathi san pransisko sama samuluwedi yuda aparadha adhikaranaye thinduwa japanaya wisin piliganimata ekanga wiya.
meya lankiya samajaye pamanak nowa lowa sama ratakama janapriya menma mathabhedathmaka mathrukawaki.
‘hari dan wade hariya, sithuwath eda sunil aariyarathnatath waradini.
ema kalaya thula sancharakayin 1,885,045 k sancharaya kara thibe.
ee nisa ehema thama.
huwamaru karagatha yuthuyi.
mese panchendriyayan pilibandawama prashna kalaseka.
awapahawu dath sandaha thuni posilen siwiyak alawa kerena wedana rahitha pa්rathikaraya sandaha waya wanne sathiyaka kalayak pamani.
meya wataha gatha yuthu nowanne da?..."
mama witharak noweyi aanduwath kiwwa, polisiyath kiwwa, hamudawath kiwwa kawuda kale kiyala kiyanna thama puluwankamak nahayi kiyala.

api dan gal wala kotala thiyana shila lipi hoyagena eewa kiyawala ape ithihasaya hoyanna trayi karanawa wage dawasaka oyalage me blog post anagatha parapura proyojanyata gani..eyala deyak mewagen igana gani hithana pathana widiha wenasak weyi ..api nathath loketa deyak ithuru karala giya kiyala oyalata sathutu wenna puluwan.
ee sandaha sahayogaya dimata ya.
warthamanaye pawathina janamadhya prawanatha heyin tharu ikmanin paya ikmanin basa yayi.

sidu kala yuthuwa thibune ma balayata path wu pasuwa oba thumanla mehema bayen jiwath wanna awashya wanne na...mama obathumanlata wadath hoda jiwana margayak sakas kara denawa...oba thumanlage daruwanta oona thanaka gihin mage thaththa rajaye sewakayek,amma wyawasayakayek lesa kiyanna puluwan hetak uda karanawa...yanuweni.
palamu dinaye sitama eka digatama sinaha wu athara kalyana wita ema darunuthama aabadhaya sampurnayenma suwa wu bawi warthagatha karunak wiya.
mallige pilithure saba arthaya owun dedena mithurekuge pariganakayata, boho durata pariganaka krida athulu kirimata yana bawa yayi watahagannata mata apahasu wuye naha...
jon senewirathna kiweya.
irida aluyama hatharayi thiha weddi api kolambain pitath wunemu.
mema thaththwaya salaka balu parisara dushanaya palanaya kirime eekakaya, eyata piliyamak washayen ekangatha sahayogithwa madhyasthanaya pihituwa atha.
mathiwarana kal damu samaye jathyantharayata eya nopenunu bawayi ohu wadi duratath kiya sitiye.

balayen paha keruna aanduwe aadhara karuwan wana thayilantha ‘rathu kamisa’ sanwidhanayata mudal saha wenath aakarayen dayaka wena balawega kerehi awadhanaya yomu karana yuda hamuda palanaya, idiri kalayehi thamanta erehiwa nagi sitimata idakada athi oonama abhiyogayak walakwa lima sandaha sudanamin sitina bawayi, bankok nagaraye sitina bibisi warthakaru pawasanne.
ohu miya giye nuwara eliye suwisal maduraka dasi dassan piriwara genaya.

ehidi widuhalpathiwaraya siya mithurata pala kala mathaya wi aththe janapa්riya pasalaka widuhalpathiwarayakuta ema janapa්riya pasale samaja watapitawata galapena gambhira jiwithayak pawathwagena yamata siduwana bawath labena watupen eeta galapena jiwithayak pawathwagena yamata puluwankamak nathi nisa ayatha margayen mudal upayana thaththwayakata thallu wannata ewani widuhalpathiwarunta siduwana bawaya.
lokaya pilibada sakalya hagimen balanawita apa balaporoththuwana sankethathmaka piya sha්ri lanka samajaya thula sitida?
lakshaya wakraya haraha
oksijan mattama pahala thibu awadhiye sagarawala dolamayit hata gannata athayi wishwasa kala haki bawa hung pawasayi.
mama giya samurdi bankuwata salli ganna....
kisima manussayek ta ee rogaya epa..
eya merata sinhala, demala, muslim samagiye wadagath sandhisthanayaki.
kesewethath guwan yanaya ikmanin kolambaata aa nisa wadi welawak ema darshanaya maginta dakimata nohaki wu bawada wartha weyi.
widiyowath pahath thiyenawa kamathi kenekuta bala ganna..
ratawal abhyantharayeda meyata samana thathwayan mathu kara atha.
ashoka ee siyallan samangama yalu mithurukam athikaragaththaya.
arawinda samarasinha: oonama namak dama profayil ekak hada ganima amaru wadak nowana nisa ano kament iwath kirimen wenne fek profayil wadi wadiyen mathu wima pamani.
meya samaga piyayure athidhwani parikshawak kirima samanyayi.
me kridakaya ese mese kridakayek neweyi. 1985 indala 1996 wenakan witin wita jathika kandayama niyojanaya karapu pradip mathiws kiyana mayakari danga pandu yawanna.
manda, redi nandage awasthawa elambaenuye madhusamaya nimawi dewani gamana paminimen pasuwa wimayi.
‘’poduwe githaya gana kiyannata ek suwishesha deyak thiyenawa; eya obata ‘wadunoth’, obe wedanawa thuran weyi.’’
beheth gannawath salli nathi wakugadu rogiyekuta aadayam badu gewannayi danwayi..
ese wune danata awuru 10-15 kata kalini.
ema prahara magin irakaye batahira pradeshaya rajaye hamuda sandaha wiwruthawi atha.
eeta passe unwahanseta kiyanawa eya passe enna kiyala.
sammanthrana pawathwima hondaya.

sarthaka nama weni wathawatath mama giya kolambaa poth salpila wandanamana karagena enta.aththatama sapthambar mase labapu dawase indala mama bath haliyak wage uthura uthura hitiye mawa poth ganna ekkagena yanakan.kankendiri gananawaka saha muna ellagena sitim polimakata passe pahugiya brahaspathinda mawa poth balanna ekka yanna gedara aththo kamathi una.mawa ekkagena yanna mage demapiyan adimadi karanneth hethuwak athuwa ithin.mata poth dakkama nikan uurata mada dakka wage..poth assata bahala natanakan iwasum na.ithin anthime andi wathath ukas karala thamayi ganipu poth thogeta salli gewanna wenne.eeth ehemayi kiyala bane.badata aahara nathi unath manasata poth ooni ;)
mudal soyanna yama thula mithra dama ahimi wima mona tharam dukbarada ?
atamge madihath wimen ruwan ha ma ekangathawayakata pamina thibiyadi oba me karanne awilen ginnakata pinduru ek kirimayi.
maya hemita thusharita miminiya..
ema ratawalwala aarthikaya bida watima apage nishpadana sadaha athi illuma adu karayi.
wathurakaruwan hathi wati wateyi...
depalakage kakul kapa dama atha.
obage sampurna lipiya eya awasan wana ayurinma apata laba denna.
eetath wada wipakshaya durwala kirime wade mangala tharam sahalluwen karannata puluwan kawuruwath ee aanduwe hitiye natha.
kumbaukgate wirayo mage chandaya mahindata nohoth me dasa makkatayi jakalayina...

“ yam kenek athulathath daki da, pitathath daki da, aawaranayakin thorawa siyalla dakna hethema shabdaya asa eyata adi noya yi.”sangithaya kerehi budu dahama dakwana aakalpaya pahadiliwa therum no ganna kenakuta eya sangithayata erehiwa yana dahamaka yi hangennata ida atha.
akaryakashamathawa prathipalaya lesa sammukha we.
nohithapu mohothaka pirisak issaraha kathawak karanna gaththama hamotama wenawa wage matath hin dadiyayi, maha dadiyayi dekama damma.
eeth eeka maha paduwak.
”gatha wu wasara 100 thula lokaye bihi wu wishishtathama nawa nipayuma kumakdayi oba magen asanawa.
samanya dewal misaka wena kisi deyak kiwweth na.
lin madi prathipaththiyen obbata rata peratama …janapathi maithri lokaya dinu nayakayek
“ee wenuwen jiwithe paraduwata thiyanna barinam api husma ganna eke prayojane mokakda?
eeka nam bohoma paressamata uththara dennath, kamaththen uththara dennath puluwan prashnayak.
me wyayam karana atharathura obe aahara purudu gana salakilimath wiya yuthuya.
api gowi kule un do!"
mama hithanawa, ada patan ganna ekath ee widiye deyak karayi kiyala.
ohu pasu­gi­yada silumina samanga suhada sanwa­da­ya­kata ekwuye me aaka­ra­yeni.
ema sama pradeshayak ma yuddhaya pawathi samaye wipakshaye balaya pawathi pradesha we.
pasuwa aya mage kamarayata pamina oyata mata katha karanna oona kiwwa.
ee atharathura ni.
awadiwanna, awadiwanna dipthimath dinaki uda wela thiyenne….
ese nam rajitha kiyana paridi lankawe hamuda lokka ha aarakshaka lekam pangiriwiye kolu gatayekugen aawa kalliyak haduweda?

ehema nathnam yaluwo aapu welawaka ee bothal imbainna dila form puropu welawaluth thibba.
meka samanya maranayak lesa dakinne keseda?
ada ee kiwwe 28 wanida awari rajakari niwaduwak gaththe ya deka noratha ratha wu, thotaputha ha mashi depalage mangalya sandaha sahabhagi wenna.
ehenam atlantis oya than deken ekak da kiyala mama mistar edwad gen ahuwa.
ganu lamaya kristhiyani nisa.
dan nam oya mukuthma na..
samsa yanu thama wruththiya wisin purudu puhunu karanu labu kikarukama saha winaya his mudunin gath sewakayeki.
ape rate minissu bahutharayak swargayata giyath oya kuhakakam aragena yayi...
jawipe awasanayedi langa wu simawa itha akaryakshama simawaki.
eya wisanda gaththata nam kisi prashnayak naha.
oona tharam nama yojana wunath gnyaw kiwa haki ekek penennata natha.-

mage namath dala thiyenne thaththage hithumatheta.
dedena kulupaga wu pasu dina kipayakata pasu….
malagiya wawullu wage.
kona manimata bhawitha we.
ee eddi bandhanagaraya athule monawada dakinna thibune ?
oya kalakanniya thawa masa kihipayakin marila yanawa nidi adema.
chandarelage game paraka ee kale bas ekaka wechcha thawa aththa kathawak me link eken kiyewwaki.

api nodanuwathwama, ape hithatath hora apata sadakalika aashwadayak gena denawa.samahara rathi්ra kalawaladi game kadayedi kumara mata hamuwenawa.“kumara, hamadama bonna epa ban.ma ese kiyana hamadamath ohu pilithurak nodi kiyanne ekama wakiyayi.“maru minihane mata kiyanne.”handa naga hinawemin ese kiyana ohu kade mitha්raya desa balanawa.“yamu sunil ayiye”ese kiyamin dara mitiya osowa ganna ohu yalith supurudu githaya patangannawa.“sunil ayiyata karadarayak naha neda?”“apoyi naha.”atharamagadi gayima nathara karana ohu mehema kiyanawa.“kohomahari jiwath wenna oona sunil ayiye.”ee welawata mama ohu hadawathin walandagena pitata thattuwak danawa.apa labala kalayedima ape jiwitha wenas karannata rusiyanu sahithyaya monatharam balapamak kala da yanna gana mata me mohothe hithata enawa.
